summary: FRONT BRAKE ROTORS AND CALIPERS HAD TO BE REPLACED FOR THE THIRD TIME. *AK  TSB # 05 033 02 WAS ISSUED BY THE MANUFACTURER BUT THEY WOULD NOT REPAIR THE BRAKES.  THE FRONT BRAKE ROTORS WERE REPLACED BY THE DEALER UNDER WARRANTY.  THE CONSUMER REPLACED AT OWN EXPENSE.  AT 56K MILES, THE BRAKES NEEDED TO BE REPLACED AGAIN.  WHEN THE BRAKES WERE APPLIED LIGHTLY, THE STEERING WHEEL VIBRATED SEVERELY AND WAS HARD TO CONTROL.  *SCC   *JB
